snippet: The Hamas government demolished more than a dozen makeshift homes this week in the impoverished enclave, and officials said they would soon remove the rest of the structures.
abstract: Hamas government bulldozes more than a dozen makeshift homes in an impoverished Gaza enclave known as the Forgotten Neighborhood, and officials say they will remove the rest of the structures, which were built without permits on public land.
lead_paragraph: The Hamas government demolished more than a dozen makeshift homes this week in the impoverished enclave, and officials said they would soon remove the rest of the structures.

headline.main: Gaza: Bulldozers Raze Part of Forgotten Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Bulldozers Raze Part of Forgotten Neighborhood
